message.raw:
Use the correct version of ign-msgs when generating pkg-config and cmake files.

Since ign-transport has fallback logic from ign-msgs1 to ign-msgs0,
we have to use the correct one when generating pkg-config and
cmake files for other projects.  Do that here.
